title: What is the "Active Initiation Power" and how does it relate to the esoteric evolution theory?
first_phrase: In these final 200 tokens, the author delves into the concept of active initiation power, or solar power, which creates a force that is detached from mortal man and can influence and enhance human strength. The author explains that this power is not sanctifying but rather triumphant and can be attracted through traditional sympathetic rituals or sacrificial actions. The author draws connections to the tradition of the warriors and the way Rome understood and celebrated power through action and institutions. The text ends by discussing the esoteric perspective on evolution, which goes against the modern fixation on the concept.
